author: Special Correspondent
text:
Four ancient idols and puja materials, all made of panchaloha, were unearthed at the residence of S. Yasa Alabadh at Pudhu Viduthi near Karambakudi on Friday. The idols were noticed while digging the earth for laying foundation for a room at the residence.

The treasure included two idols of Sri Ambal, one idol of Sri Chandikeswarar, Sri Siva and Sri Tirugnanasambandar. The idols were exquisitely carved. The idol of Sri Tirugnanasambandar was in a dancing posture, while Lord Siva with four arms had a ‘udukkai’.
title: Panchaloha idols unearthed
